evidence.claim: MMIT utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
MMIT has integration capabilities with EHR systems using defined APIs.
The company supports healthcare transactions including X12 837 and 835 formats.
MMIT employs Kafka for stream processing within their data architecture.
MMIT offers FHIR APIs for healthcare data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: MMIT handles X12 transactions and has robust API capabilities for health data.
